name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior QA Engineer with over 10 years of robust experience in **QA** methodologies and **Automation** testing. Proficient in utilizing **Selenium**, **Playwright**, **BrowserStack**, and **SauceLabs** to ensure high-quality releases with cutting-edge automation techniques. Demonstrated expertise in **Python** and frameworks like **Django**, coupled with a strong command of **GitLab** for version control. Adept in leveraging cloud services like **AWS** to enhance testing environments. Proven leadership capabilities, strong communication, and teamwork skills honed through successful collaborations on impactful projects at leading organizations, including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed and executed test automation frameworks using **Selenium** and **Playwright** for efficient testing of web applications, ensuring high-quality deliverables.
Engineered automated testing solutions in **Python** to streamline QA processes, reducing manual testing efforts by **50%**.
Collaborated closely with development teams to implement CI/CD pipelines using **GitLab**, enhancing collaboration and accelerating delivery cycles by **30%**.
Designed test plans and strategies to ensure comprehensive QA coverage for new features and enhancements, resulting in a decrease of post-release defects by **25%**.
Utilized cloud testing tools like **BrowserStack** and **SauceLabs** for cross-browser compatibility testing, achieving consistent performance across **10+** different browsers and devices.
Emphasized strong communication and teamwork skills to lead a team of 5 QA engineers, fostering a culture of quality and continuous improvement.
Provided leadership in QA processes, implementing best practices and mentoring team members to refine testing methodologies.

Conducted **QA** testing and validation of backend systems developed in **Python** and **FastAPI**, ensuring high-quality deliverables for document workflows and user onboarding.
Implemented **Automation** strategies using **Selenium** and **Playwright** for cross-browser testing, enhancing testing efficiency by **30%** and reducing manual efforts.
Utilized **GitLab** for version control and CI/CD pipelines, achieving a **20%** faster deployment cycle for project releases.
Managed QA processes with tools like **BrowserStack** and **SauceLabs**, facilitating compatibility testing across **15** different browsers and mobile devices.
Fostered **Leadership** and improved **Teamwork** by mentoring junior QA engineers and conducting knowledge-sharing sessions, resulting in a **50%** increase in team productivity.
Executed comprehensive test plans to cover functional, regression, and performance testing, contributing to the seamless integration of microservices hosted on **Azure App Services**.
Maintained clear and effective **Communication** with cross-functional teams to ensure adherence to regulatory compliance and successful project deliveries.

Executed comprehensive **QA** strategies to ensure the quality of backend services developed for trade execution and portfolio management.
Automated testing processes using **Selenium** and **Playwright** to validate the functionality and performance of applications with **up to 99.9%** accuracy.
Utilized **Gitlab** for version control and collaboration, enhancing team productivity and code reliability with over **50+** commits per month.
Integrated cloud services like **AWS** to streamline deployment and testing environments, ensuring scalability and reliability of services.
Implemented robust test suites employing **PyTest** and **tox**, resulting in a **30%** reduction in bug rates during pre-release stages.
Facilitated communication and teamwork among cross-functional teams, enhancing the effectiveness of project deliveries and ensuring alignment with business objectives.
Provided leadership in a fast-paced environment, championing automation initiatives that increased testing throughput by **40%**.
